title: User-Centric Privacy Controls - User-Friendly Privacy Settings Interface
summary: As an older adult, I want a simple and intuitive way to manage my privacy settings so that I can feel secure and in control of my personal information while using ALFRED.

title: Adaptive System Configuration – Guided Onboarding Process with Voice Assistance
summary: As a retired social worker, I want a guided onboarding process with voice assistance so that I can easily configure and use the ALFRED system without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Health Monitoring Integration
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to integrate seamlessly with my wearable health monitor so that I can keep track of my health conditions and receive timely support for managing my arthritis pain.

title: Voice-Driven Social Connection
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to use voice commands to easily communicate with my family and access news sources so that I can stay socially connected and informed despite my limited mobility.

title: User Feedback Mechanism - In-App Reporting for Issues and Suggestions
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to easily report any issues or suggestions I have within the ALFRED system so that I can ensure it meets my needs and helps me stay connected and engaged.

title: Accessibility Compliance Assurance – Customizable Accessibility Profiles for Individual Needs
summary: As an older adult, I want to have customizable accessibility profiles so that I can adjust the system's interface and functionalities according to my specific physical and cognitive needs, making it easier for me to stay connected and manage my daily tasks.
